channel.title: Community-Analysis on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Community-Analysis on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Community Sentiment Analysis - Data Integration and AI
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop an AI-powered system that analyzes community interactions across Discord and social media platforms to understand sentiment, needs, and trends within our community, providing actionable insights for community engagement and product development.
